titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3233) to establish the National Commission to Investigate the January 6 Attack on the United States Capitol Complex, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3237) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2021, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3233) to establish the National Commission to Investigate the January 6 Attack on the United States Capitol Complex, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3237) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2021, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3233) to establish the National Commission to Investigate the January 6 Attack on the United States Capitol Complex, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3237) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2021, and for other purposes..

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-38, by Mr. McGovern.

Resolution provides for consideration of H.R. 3233 and H.R. 3237 under a closed rule. The resolution provides that the previous question shall be ordered on both bills without intervening motion except one hour of debate and one motion to recommit.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 18.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 409.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 409, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Cole demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 208 (Roll no. 151).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 208 (Roll no. 152).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3233 (National Commission to Investigate the January 6 Attack on the United States Capitol Complex Act) and H.R. 3237 (Emergency Security Supplemental to Respond to January 6th Appropriations Act, 2021).
